prompts.title: Creative Story Starter
prompts.content: You wake up in a world where gravity works in reverse only on Tuesdays. Describe your first Tuesday.

prompts.title: Python Code Challenge: Palindrome
prompts.content: Write a Python function that checks if a given string is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backward), ignoring spaces and capitalization.

prompts.title: Recipe Idea: Quick Weeknight Pasta
prompts.content: Need a fast dinner? Combine cooked pasta with cherry tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, basil, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. What variations can you think of?

comments.content: Floating to the ceiling was weird at first, but coffee was the real challenge!
My cat did NOT enjoy reverse gravity Tuesday.
Here's my solution: `def is_palindrome(s): s = ''.join(filter(str.isalnum, s)).lower(); return s == s[::-1]`
Don't forget edge cases like empty strings or single characters!
Adding some feta cheese at the end is delicious!
I like to add spinach and mushrooms too.
A squeeze of lemon juice brightens it up.
